impact: Achieved 92% accuracy on text extraction from 150+ scanned documents
Worked in an agile team with EDF experts to improve answer quality

projects.title: AIPortfolio
projects.description: Revolutionary AI-powered portfolio system: edit a single JSON file to get a complete interactive portfolio with an intelligent chatbot. Built with Next.js, React, and TypeScript. Features modern design, dynamic project showcases, and zero code required for updates.

projects.title: Infrastructure Optimization Assistant
projects.description: A modular AI-powered application designed to analyze infrastructure monitoring data, detect technical anomalies (e.g., high CPU usage, latency spikes), and generate actionable optimization recommendations using GPT-4o. Built for SMEs to improve system performance and resilience.

images.alt: Live visualization of infrastructure anomalies and AI-generated recommendations
API endpoint handling data ingestion and anomaly detection

achievements: Modular multi-node architecture for ingestion, detection, and LLM-based recommendation.
Realtime analysis pipeline using FastAPI and async/await for LLM calls.
Structured separation of concerns via independent business logic modules.
Interactive frontend dashboard for uploading JSON, visualizing metrics, and receiving AI recommendations.
Robust error handling and fallback logic implemented in API endpoints.
Fully testable backend modules with unit test structure ready for pytest.

projects.title: AI Chatbot Assistant
projects.description: Query Bot is an AI-powered application that allows users to interact with multiple PDF documents using natural language. It leverages language models and semantic search to answer questions based on the actual content of uploaded PDFs.

images.alt: PDF text extraction and chunking process

achievements: Built a full-stack PDF chatbot using Streamlit and OpenAI GPT.
Extracted and chunked text from multiple PDFs for semantic processing.
Integrated vector search with FAISS for contextual retrieval.
Enabled natural language interaction with document content.
Used LangChain to manage prompt templates and memory.
Deployed locally with Streamlit CLI and .env-based key management.

projects.title: Full-Self Driving System Simulation
projects.description: Developed a 2D autonomous driving system in a simulated environment using the synchronous language Heptagon and C integration. The vehicle navigates a virtual city while respecting speed limits, traffic lights, and avoiding obstacles. Visualization handled via SDL2, with debugging and performance analysis tools integrated.

projects.title: Tic Tac Toe
projects.description: Tic Tac Toe is an interactive web app built with React. It allows two players to compete in a classic game of tic-tac-toe, with a simple, responsive, and user-friendly interface.

projects.title: Smart Training Advisor
projects.description: An intelligent training recommendation system powered by Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG). It analyzes employee skill assessments, detects competency gaps, and generates personalized training plans using GPT-4. Designed for HR teams seeking automated, insightful, and scalable workforce development strategies.

projects.title: Intelligent Document Analysis
projects.description: An advanced Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system that analyzes complex documents containing text, images, tables, and charts. Powered by LangChain, Unstructured, and GPT-4 Vision, it extracts and interprets multimodal data to answer user queries through a sleek Streamlit interface.

projects.title: AstroControl
projects.description: AstroControl is a space robotics supervision system designed to control and monitor autonomous robots through a centralized dashboard. Built with Java, Spring, and PostgreSQL, it enables real-time mission creation, monitoring, and simulation. A RESTful API facilitates integration and robot communication, while unit testing ensures system robustness. This scalable solution supports mission simulation, alerts, and robot telemetry in a secure, modular architecture.

projects.title: Protecto-Cycle
projects.description: Protecto-Cycle is a smart lighting system for bicycles that automates headlights and turn signals based on rider movements and surroundings. It uses motion detection and directional input to control front lights, brake lights, and blinkers for enhanced road safety. Designed with Arduino and Raspberry Pi, it merges energy efficiency with real-time responsiveness.

projects.title: Eliza Chatbot
projects.description: A Lisp implementation of the classic Eliza chatbot, simulating a psychotherapist through pattern-matching rules and scripted dialogue. Inspired by the original 1966 MIT project, this version mimics conversational exchanges using symbolic AI techniques such as rule-based pattern matching and simple memory context.

projects.title: MetroFlow
projects.description: MetroFlow is a modular Java application that calculates optimal routes in a subway network. Developed with a Test-Driven Development (TDD) approach, it ensures robust, maintainable, and reliable code through comprehensive unit tests. Ideal for urban mobility simulations, the app computes shortest or fastest paths between stations with precision.

projects.title: Smart Beverage Distribution Database System
projects.description: A robust relational database system designed for Liquide & Co to manage production, distribution, invoicing, and compliance of beverage logistics. It handles customers, suppliers, product types, geographic regions, subsidies, and enforces business rules using SQL functions, views, and triggers.

projects.title: BookShop Management System
projects.description: A C++ application to manage a bookstore's inventory, suppliers, employees, purchases, and sales. The system interacts with a MySQL database to provide complete CRUD functionality, track purchases, generate invoices, and manage memberships.

job.workStyle: Curious and pragmatic, fast learner, collaborative mindset. Comfortable with Agile methods, iterative development, code reviews, and CI/CD practices.
job.goals: I'm looking to join a software engineering team where I can build reliable backend systems, contribute to impactful applications, and apply my skills in AI and cloud technologies when needed. I want to keep learning and improving, while working on meaningful projects.

funFacts: Love solving complex problems with simple solutions
Enjoy hiking, photography, and exploring new tech
Tech enthusiast always exploring new tools and frameworks
Enjoy mentoring and sharing knowledge with others
Avid reader of sci-fi and tech blogs
Enjoy traveling and experiencing new cultures
Fitness enthusiast who loves hiking and outdoor adventures
Enjoy cooking and experimenting with new recipes
personality.workingStyle: I move fast, learn faster, and love tackling challenging problems
personality.motivation: Building technology that makes a real impact on people's lives
